Reviews.Title: great product.
Reviews.Author: Ann De la cruz "Ann De la cruz"
Reviews.Content: inexpensive. works great. plugs into the wall. comes with a car charger. plastic isn't too sturdy, but does the job.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Gladis "Tell us about yourself!"
Reviews.Content: I had to buy this because the original one that came with my camera I lost. It does the job and I think it's even faster than the one that came with my camera. You just load the battery in it and plug it in directly in the wall. No cables or anything. Great Value!

ProductInfo.Features:
Compatible with:
Casio EX-Z77, EX-Z75, EX-S880, EX-S770
ProductInfo.Name: NA Video / Digital Camera Charger Charger For Casio EX-Z75
